parameterDecorators.name: newOwner
parameterDecorators.description: The new owner for this contract.

functionDecorators.name: getTokenByOwnerAtIndex
functionDecorators.description: gets a token at index registered under a user address.

returnDecorators.description: token address registered to the user address.

functionDecorators.name: getTokensLengthByOwner
functionDecorators.description: gets the total number of tokens registered under a user address.

returnDecorators.description: uint total of token addresses registered to the user address.

functionDecorators.name: isENMT
functionDecorators.description: returns true if the token is a valid ENMT token generated by the Unicrypt Minter.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: registerToken
functionDecorators.description: called by a registered tokenGenerator upon token creation.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: tokenAtIndex
functionDecorators.description: gets an ENMT token at a specific index. Although using Enumerable Set, since tokens are only added and not removed, indexes will never change.

returnDecorators.description: the address of the ENMT token at index.

functionDecorators.name: tokenGeneratorAtIndex
functionDecorators.description: Gets the address of a registered tokenGenerator at specified index.

functionDecorators.name: tokenGeneratorIsAllowed
functionDecorators.description: returns true if contract is allowed to generate and register tokens.

functionDecorators.name: tokensLength
functionDecorators.description: The length of all valid ENMT tokens on the platform.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
